verbs.description: [ARG0: A San Diego federal judge] [V: ruled] [ARG1: that the Trump administration policy of separating unauthorized immigrant parents from their children is unconstitutional] , [ARGM-ADV: describing the allegations of forced separations as “ brutal ” and unfair] .

A San Diego federal judge ruled that the Trump administration policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: unauthorized immigrant parents] [ARG2: from their children] is unconstitutional , describing the allegations of forced separations as “ brutal ” and unfair .

A San Diego federal judge ruled that [ARG1: the Trump administration policy of separating unauthorized immigrant parents from their children] [V: is] [ARG2: unconstitutional] , describing the allegations of forced separations as “ brutal ” and unfair .

[ARG0: A San Diego federal judge] ruled that the Trump administration policy of separating unauthorized immigrant parents from their children is unconstitutional , [V: describing] [ARG1: the allegations of forced separations] [ARG2: as “ brutal ” and unfair] .
